content: more professional finish also with this border you can be creative and pick a pattern from the throw and really make it your own i have put the link here by tinna thorudottir thorvaldar https //www youtube com/watch v=quygnsrgk0q&list=rdcmuccletbus9y_v1o2bp sjj-oa&start_radio=1&rv=quygnsrgk0q 15 i hope you have enjoyed crocheting your own version as much as i have enjoyed creating it i would love to see your finished work i am always excited to see the colour variations and the borders you have chosen please tag me in your instagram posts if you upload any photos of the red forest throw if i upload any photos of your work i will credit you for it and tag you in it instagram collbarnyarn facebook colleen barns email colleenbarns@gmail com au ravelry craftycollbarns 16
